title: I can't pick my Chromas in blind pick!
body: I bought multiple Chromas during the IP Sale period and I am inconsistently able to pick them. Either in champ select, the skin that the chroma in question is for appears as its default state or the chroma picker is available. Does anyone know anything about this?

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be corruptions in your local assets for League. I recommend [completing a repair of the client's files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if that did the trick!
This didn't work for me, unfortunately.

Darn, I was hoping it would. I'd like one of our tech specialists to dive into your system logs, so I recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite your service.

Let me know if you have any questions.
